publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1208# Alex Fergusson: Recognition of Pigeon Racing—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Homing Union (SHU) on the success of its "Millennium Race" and for drawing entries from all parts of the United Kingdom for this unique and innovative event, and urges sportscotland to give official recognition to the sport of pigeon racing in order to enable the SHU to have access to lottery and other funding for the further development of this traditional activity.
S1M-1208# Recognition of Pigeon Racing (lodged on 22 September 2000) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1208# Recognition of Pigeon Racing (lodged on 22 September 2000) Alex Johnstone*, Mr Murray Tosh*, David Mundell*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Nick Johnston*
S1M-1208# Recognition of Pigeon Racing (lodged on 22 September 2000) Phil Gallie*, David McLetchie*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Margaret Jamieson*, Euan Robson*
S1M-1208# Recognition of Pigeon Racing (lodged on 22 September 2000) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, John Scott*, Dennis Canavan*, Cathy Peattie*

S1M-1208# Alex Fergusson: Recognition of Pigeon Racing—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Homing Union (SHU) on the success of its "Millennium Race" and for drawing entries from all parts of the United Kingdom for this unique and innovative event, and urges sportscotland to give official recognition to the sport of pigeon racing in order to enable the SHU to have access to lottery and other funding for the further development of this traditional activity. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Alex Johnstone, Mr Murray Tosh, David Mundell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Nick Johnston, Phil Gallie, David McLetchie, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Margaret Jamieson, Euan Robson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, John Scott, Dennis Canavan, Cathy Peattie, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-1208# Recognition of Pigeon Racing (lodged on 22 September 2000) Karen Whitefield*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-1208# Recognition of Pigeon Racing (lodged on 22 September 2000) Alex Neil*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-1208# Recognition of Pigeon Racing (lodged on 22 September 2000) Mr David Davidson*
S1M-1208# Recognition of Pigeon Racing (lodged on 22 September 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Jamie Stone*

Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Alex Johnstone, Mr Murray Tosh, David Mundell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Nick Johnston, Phil Gallie, David McLetchie, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Margaret Jamieson, Euan Robson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, John Scott, Dennis Canavan, Cathy Peattie, Mr Adam Ingram, Karen Whitefield, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Alex Neil, Mr Brian Monteith, Fiona Hyslop, Mr David Davidson, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Jamie Stone
